scripts.db:start: docker run --rm -v data:/var/lib/postgresql/data --name treehacks-db -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=postgres -e POSTGRES_DB=priv_note_db -e POSTGRES_USER=postgres -p 5431:5432 postgres
scripts.db:stop: docker stop treehacks-db && docker rm treehacks-db
scripts.db:reset: docker exec -it treehacks-db psql -U postgres -c 'DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS treehacks_db'
